channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: How the public’s shift on immigration paved the way for Trump’s crackdown
item.description: Since returning to the White House, President Donald Trump has launched an unprecedented campaign of immigration enforcement that has pushed the limits of executive power and clashed with federal judges trying to restrain him.

item.title: Fears of racial profiling swirl over registration policy for immigrants in the US illegally
Forecasters warn of fire risk amid low humidity, wind gusts as Pine Barrens fire burns
